snippet: The people, places and approaches to creativity that are Art Basel Miami and its offshoots make it a destination for both global collectors and seekers of the avant-garde.
abstract: Slew of alternative fairs and pop-up exhibitions concurrent with lavish Art Basel Miami provide space for experimental pieces, political themes and underrepresented populations.
lead_paragraph: The people, places and approaches to creativity that are Art Basel Miami and its offshoots make it a destination for both global collectors and seekers of the avant-garde.

headline.seo: Art Basel Miami Stretches Into Little Haiti
headline.main: Art Is a Splash, Grand and Tiny, in Miami
headline.print_headline: Art Is a Splash, Grand and Tiny, in Miami
